attributes.action: ensure the continued investment and operation of the Jodrell Bank Radio Telescope.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We also wish to ensure the continued investment in the e-Merlin radio astronomy system to safeguard UK involvement in Radio Astronomy for future generations

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "ensure the continued investment and operation of the Jodrell Bank Radio Telescope."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page18959


Prime Minister's Office
